iti69:2.1: “Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa va bhikkhuniya va rago appahino, doso appahino, moho appahino—
iti69:2.2: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘atinno samuddam saumim savicim savattam sagaham sarakkhasam’.
iti69:2.3: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa va bhikkhuniya va rago pahino, doso pahino, moho pahino—
iti69:2.4: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘atari samuddam saumim savicim savattam sagaham sarakkhasam, tinno parangato thale titthati brahmano’”ti.
iti69:5.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
